sentences.sContent: I am restless. I am athirst for faraway things.
sentences.sContent_eng: I am restless. I am athirst for faraway things.
sentences.sCn: 我心绪不宁。我渴望着遥远的事物。

sentences.sContent: I will give unto him that is athirst of the fountain of the water of life freely.
sentences.sContent_eng: I will give unto him that is athirst of the fountain of the water of life freely.
sentences.sCn: 我要将生命泉的水白白赐给那口渴的人喝。
